title: NoHussle
author: NoHussle
content: Hi folks,I´m looking for Antminer S19 XP/140th or Antminer S19j PRO/96thWhere can I find the list of verified distributors for those rigs?Link for minershttps://www.asicminervalue.com/miners/bitmain/antminer-s19-xp-140thhttps://www.asicminervalue.com/miners/bitmain/antminer-s19j-pro-96th

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: NoHussle on April 11, 2023, 04:01:10 PMHi folks,I´m looking for Antminer S19 XP/140th or Antminer S19j PRO/96thWhere can I find the list of verified distributors for those rigs?Is there any reason you don't want to purchase from the store of the official site?https://shop.bitmain.com/product/detail?pid=00020230112174741027ww6zyrL306F4https://shop.bitmain.com/product/detail?pid=00020221229153045195XzfP62rE069Cit's better as you won't risk losing your money to scammers acting as resellersQuote from: NoHussle on April 11, 2023, 04:01:10 PMLink for minershttps://www.asicminervalue.com/miners/bitmain/antminer-s19-xp-140thhttps://www.asicminervalue.com/miners/bitmain/antminer-s19j-pro-96thI wouldn't trust the resellers in those links. I have even seen scam accusations about some of them.
